ResolutionPath: Obtain site layout from DEL-00.01 to determine pipe routing distances; obtain vendor quotes for backflow preventer and pipe materials; establish plumbing labor rates

Description: Security Gate & Access Control Installation - gate hardware access control system and installation estimated at $75000 CAD allowance
ResolutionPath: Obtain vendor quotes for access control systems and gate hardware; clarify Employer security standards and integration requirements

Description: Temporary Site Facilities & Infrastructure - temporary facilities laydown areas utilities fencing and site infrastructure estimated at $850000 CAD allowance (Materials $500k + Construction $350k)
ResolutionPath: Obtain Employer's Requirements for site establishment criteria; develop site layout (DEL-00.01) with specific facility counts and areas; obtain vendor quotes for modular office rentals fencing electrical service; break down into detailed line items by component once quantities known

Description: Security Gate Staffing - construction phase security operations estimated at $180000 CAD allowance for 24-month construction (12hr/day 6day/week @ $30/hr)
ResolutionPath: Clarify gate operating hours (24/7 vs. limited hours) staffing model (dedicated vs. roving) and construction duration from project schedule
